title: Vertex Locates On The Axis of Symmetry
text: The vertex is a point on the line of symmetry, so its x-coordinate will be $$x=-2$$. We only need to compute f(-2) to get the y coordinate.

title: Compute The y-coordinate
text: Plug $$x=-2$$ into the equation $$f(x)=-2x^2-8x-3$$. What is f(-2)?

title: Put The Answer Into (x,y)
text: As the final answer, we can put together the x and y coordinates which gives (-2,5).
